%% Divine Genocide Policy - Chapter 5
flowchart TD
    A[Divine Genocide Policy] --> B[Identify Target Population]
    B --> C[Issue Herem Command]
    C --> D[Kill All Men]
    D --> E[Kill All Women]
    E --> F[Kill All Children]
    F --> G[Kill All Infants]
    G --> H[Kill All Animals]
    H --> I[Burn Everything]
    I --> J[Take Sex Slaves if Applicable]
    J --> K[God's Tribute from Slaves]
    K --> L[Any Survivors = Sin]
    L --> M[Incomplete Genocide = Divine Punishment]
    
    style A fill:#ff6b6b
    style L fill:#ff6b6b
    style M fill:#ff6b6b
